Method Detail

reorganize

public void reorganize(java.lang.Object currentStatus,
                       int ID)
                throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException,
                       java.lang.IllegalStateException
Reorganization is performed during the query-phase. Hence, the implementation of this method is empty.

Specified by:
reorganize in interface SweepArea
Overrides:
reorganize in class ImplementorBasedSweepArea
Parameters:
currentStatus - The object containing the necessary information to perform the reorganization step.
ID - An ID determining from which input this reorganization step is triggered.
Throws:
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - An UnsupportedOperationException is thrown, if is method is not supported by this SweepArea.
java.lang.IllegalStateException - Throws an IllegalStateException if this method is called at an invalid state.
